`electionAPI` is a package containing the function `electionData` wich is used to make a data frame of election data from 2014. First choose wich municipality the data should contain. Municipality codes can be found here: `http://www.scb.se/Grupp/Hitta_statistik/Regional\%20statistik/Indelningar/_Dokument/kommunlankod.pdf`. Download the API `http://www.val.se/val/val2014/slutresultat/slutresultat.zip`. Now use the function: electionData(kommun,path) with "kommun"= municipality code or municipality codes in a vector and "path"= directory to the "resultat"-folder. For example: `electionData(c("0136", "0140"), ".../Downloads/slutresultat")`.
